LanguageData.Bandagekit.label: 绷带
LanguageData.Bandagekit.description: A pack of bandages made from cloth. Less potent than medical kits.
LanguageData.Herbmedicine.label: 基本药包
LanguageData.Herbmedicine.description: A pack of mix herbs. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals. \n\nMade from aloe and cloth.
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.label: 抗生素
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.description: A concentrated extract of Healroot and some hops. Tastes awful but boosts the immune system.
